plugin.name: Patch Node child_process.spawnSync plugin
plugin.description: Cordova plugin to patch Node version pre 0.11.12 child_process with spawnSync(). Useful in combination with other Cordova plugins that use spawnSync, typically to install npm dependencies. Node child_process.spawnSync has been introduced in version 0.11.12, but typically Meteor 1.3 is still using Node 0.10.43.
